channel.title: PenguinScape pkz v.3 Recruitment Team**Need coders/Idea Makers**
channel.description: Hello,Welcome to PenguinScape pkz v.3 Read this before continuing. -I need a server programmer,That can do stuff Fast,Reliable,You must be active,I must be able to contact you like a lot. -Need a good client developer that can do things they say,Must be done on time etc. -I don't Want to continue programming servers,That's why I need a programmer -You will get most credits -I will code some parts of the server,But not many. [b]Jobs-[/b] [i]Here are some Jobs/Open for applying![/i] programming Servers-Might need more than 1.Some people are inactive and are never on Msn/Mopar etc. Idea Developers-Gives ideas on shops,etc etc. Client Coders-Might need more than 1.Some people are inactive and are never on. [b]Applications-[/b] [i]Below are applications that are open[/i] [b]Server programmer(s)-[/b] [code]Msn(Required)- Aim(Optional)- Email(Optional) Other contact info(Optional)- Java experience- Proof(must) Coding experience- Proof(Must)- Name some things you coded and for what servers(Must)-[/code] ----------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Idea and Developers-[/b] [i]Below is the application for Idea Makers,etc.[/i] [code]How creative are you- Proof*Optional*- Msn- aim- Email- Other contact info- Are you on comp alot(Time)-[/code] ------------------------------------------------------------------- Client Developers- N/A At This time. --------------------------------------------------------------- [center]Server programmers- - -[/center] [center]Idea Makers- - - -[/center] [center]Client Developers- - -[/center]

item.title: PenguinScape pkz v.3 Recruitment Team**Need coders/Idea Makers**
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“Maskmanator, post:15, topic:153953”]Idea Developer Application

How creative are you?- I am very creative. I think about some cool shit I would love to do and do all day.
ProofOptional- Hmm what if I just say I am very creative
Msn-NONE
aim-Paladinpallyz
Email-Questers@gmail.com
Other contact info- I have a Yahoo IM name, Paladinpallyz
Are you on comp alot(Time)- About 8-12 or 10-14 hours a day.

Also… I would be more than happy to be a tester if you like :).[/quote]Declined =[ Sorry

[quote=“kwl alex kwl, post:19, topic:153953”]How creative are you - really
ProofOptional- soon my m8s servers coming out and i done all the shops npcs and helped him think of good ideas
Msn-alex_superdude@hotmail.co.uk
aim-none
Email-alex_superdude@hotmail.co.uk
Other contact info-none
Are you on comp alot(Time)-alot mostly minium 3 hours daily…4-5 days a week[/quote]Declined,sorry.

[quote=“Yuxus, post:18, topic:153953”]How creative are you-Fairly
ProofOptional-made pkinpenguinscape and have an awesome silab item.cfg
Msn-danjayball@hotmail.co.uk
aim-
Email-
Other contact info-
Are you on comp alot(Time)-yes i am like 3hrs + a day

P.S:add me on msn if you accept my form[/quote]Accepted

Read full topic

item.title: PenguinScape pkz v.3 Recruitment Team**Need coders/Idea Makers**
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

Hello,Welcome to PenguinScape pkz v.3
Read this before continuing.
-I need a server programmer,That can do stuff Fast,Reliable,You must be active,I must be able to contact you like a lot.
-Need a good client developer that can do things they say,Must be done on time etc.
-I don’t Want to continue programming servers,That’s why I need a programmer
-You will get most credits
-I will code some parts of the server,But not many.
Jobs-
Here are some Jobs/Open for applying!
programming Servers-Might need more than 1.Some people are inactive and are never on Msn/Mopar etc.
Idea Developers-Gives ideas on shops,etc etc.
Client Coders-Might need more than 1.Some people are inactive and are never on.
Applications-
Below are applications that are open
Server programmer(s)-

Msn(Required)- Aim(Optional)- Email(Optional) Other contact info(Optional)- Java experience- Proof(must) Coding experience- Proof(Must)- Name some things you coded and for what servers(Must)-

Idea and Developers-
Below is the application for Idea Makers,etc.

How creative are you- Proof*Optional*- Msn- aim- Email- Other contact info- Are you on comp alot(Time)-

Client Developers-
N/A At This time.

[center]Server programmers-

-[/center]
[center]Idea Makers-

-[/center]
[center]Client Developers-

-[/center]
